title: Zero Trust Lists
description: Lists are referenced when creating Secure Web Gateway policies.

links.title: List Zero Trust Lists
links.description: List Zero Trust Lists for an account

links.title: Zero Trust List Details
links.description: Fetch a single Zero Trust List
links.response:
{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415",
    "name": "Admin Serial Numbers",
    "description": "The serial numbers for administrators",
    "type": "SERIAL",
    "created_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "updated_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "count": 20
  }
}

links.title: Zero Trust List Items
links.description: Fetch all items of a single Zero Trust List

links.title: Create Zero Trust List
links.description: Create a new Zero Trust List
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/gateway/lists" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Admin Serial Numbers","description":"The serial numbers for administrators","type":"SERIAL","items":[{"value":"8GE8721REF","created_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"}]}'

value.description: The value of the item in a List.

links.title: Update Zero Trust List
links.description: Update a configured Zero Trust List
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/gateway/lists/f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Admin Serial Numbers","description":"The serial numbers for administrators"}'
links.response:
{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415",
    "name": "Admin Serial Numbers",
    "description": "The serial numbers for administrators",
    "type": "SERIAL",
    "created_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "updated_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "count": 20
  }
}

links.title: Patch Zero Trust List
links.description: Append or remove an item from a configured Zero Trust List

value.description: The value of the item in a List.

remove.description: A list of the item values you want to remove.

items.description: The value of the item in a List.

links.response:
{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415",
    "name": "Admin Serial Numbers",
    "description": "The serial numbers for administrators",
    "type": "SERIAL",
    "created_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "updated_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "count": 20
  }
}

count.description: The number of items in the List.

object_definition.example:
{
